pages.text: Some appreciation for others in the Minecraft modding community. I don't interact with other modders, however their mod sources and tools have been a great help while developing Woot - they may not all like this mod, but I appreciate their contributions to the Minecraft modding scene.
$(li)The Forge developers$(li)Vazkii - for Patchouli$(li)McJty - for his modding tutorials$(li)The Forge Forum members that help with my questions.
The original Mod Author, Ipsis, for creating this awesome mod! I had a blast bringing it to a modern version of the game.
